preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM location_tag WHERE name = 'Main Pharmacy'

changeSet.comment: Creating the Main Pharmacy location tag

changeSet.author: dev

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM location_tag WHERE name = 'Dispensary'

changeSet.comment: Creating the dispensary location tag

changeSet.author: dev

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM location_tag WHERE name = 'Main Store'

changeSet.comment: Creating the Main Store location tag

insert.column: A location which is the main facility stock holding area.

changeSet.author: dev

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM location where lower(name) like '%pharmacy%'

changeSet.comment: Creating the Pharmacy location
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO location(name,description,creator,date_created,parent_location,uuid) SELECT 'Main Pharmacy', null,1,NOW(), (SELECT parent_location from location group by parent_location order by COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1),'7f65d926-57d6-4402-ae10-a5b3bcbf7986'

changeSet.author: dev

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM location where lower(name) like '%main store%'

changeSet.comment: Creating the Main Store location
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO location(name,description,creator,date_created,parent_location,uuid) SELECT 'Main Store', null,1,NOW(), (SELECT parent_location from location group by parent_location order by COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1),'19dbe2c0-289d-11ed-bdcb-507b9dea1806'

changeSet.author: dev

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM location_tag_map where location_id in (SELECT l.location_id FROM location l where lower(l.name) like '%pharmacy%') AND location_tag_id = (SELECT lt.location_tag_id FROM location_tag lt WHERE lt.name = 'Main Pharmacy')

changeSet.comment: Tagging Pharmacy location as store
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO location_tag_map(location_id,location_tag_id) SELECT l.location_id, (SELECT lt.location_tag_id FROM location_tag lt WHERE lt.name = 'Main Pharmacy') FROM location l where lower(l.name) like '%pharmacy%'

changeSet.author: dev

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM location_tag_map where location_id in (SELECT l.location_id FROM location l where lower(l.name) like '%main store%') AND location_tag_id = (SELECT lt.location_tag_id FROM location_tag lt WHERE lt.name = 'Main Store')

changeSet.comment: Tagging Main Store location as main store
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO location_tag_map(location_id,location_tag_id) SELECT l.location_id, (SELECT lt.location_tag_id FROM location_tag lt WHERE lt.name = 'Main Store') FROM location l where l.name like '%Main Store%'

changeSet.author: dev

changeSet.author: dev

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM notification_template WHERE uuid = '7a23df8e-53c7-11ed-b2e9-00155dc74b5a'

changeSet.comment: Creating the stock quantity below threshold email template

insert.column:
Dear %RECPT_NAME%,

This is to notify you that the following stock items have their quantities at or below the set threshold.

%STOCK_ITEMS%
Location   Stock Item   Quantity Threshold   Current Quantity
%MORE_INFO%
This email was sent from the automated system that cannot accept incoming email. Do not reply to this message.

%CENTER_NAME%

changeSet.author: dev

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM notification_template WHERE uuid = '7a23df8e-53c7-11ed-b2e9-00155dc74b5a'

changeSet.comment: Updating the stock quantity below threshold email template

update.column:
Dear %RECPT_NAME%,

This is to notify you that the following stock items have their quantities at or below the set threshold.

%STOCK_ITEMS%
Location     Stock Item     Quantity Threshold     Current Quantity
%MORE_INFO%
This email was sent from the automated system that cannot accept incoming email. Do not reply to this message.

%CENTER_NAME%

changeSet.author: dev

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM notification_template WHERE uuid = 'ff9f1cb5-576a-11ed-a495-00155dc81c72'

changeSet.comment: Creating the stock item expiry email template

insert.column:
%RECPT_NAME%,

This is to notify you that the following stock items with batch information below are expiring soon.

%STOCK_ITEMS%
Stock Item     Batch     Quantity     Expiry Date
%MORE_INFO%
This email was sent from the automated system that cannot accept incoming email. Do not reply to this message.

%CENTER_NAME%

changeSet.author: dev

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM scheduler_task_config WHERE schedulable_class = 'org.openmrs.module.stockmanagement.api.jobs.StockRuleEvaluationJob'

changeSet.sql: DELETE FROM scheduler_task_config where uuid='5a0b041a-5796-11ed-a495-00155dc81c72'
changeSet.comment: Inserting Stock Rules Evaluation Job into 'schedule_task_config' table

column.name: description
column.value: Checks the stock rules against the item quantity and notifies when quantity is at or below threshold

changeSet.author: dev

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM scheduler_task_config WHERE schedulable_class = 'org.openmrs.module.stockmanagement.api.jobs.StockBatchExpiryJob'

changeSet.sql: DELETE FROM scheduler_task_config where uuid='911fc382-5797-11ed-a495-00155dc81c72'
changeSet.comment: Inserting Stock Batch Expiry Job into 'schedule_task_config' table

column.name: description
column.value: Checks for stock items expiring soon and notifies inventory manager and clerk

changeSet.author: dev

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM notification_template WHERE uuid = '59edf349-5b76-11ed-8829-00155d8315fc'

changeSet.comment: Creating the stock operation notification template

insert.column:
Hello,

This is to notify you that %ACTION_BY% has %OPERATION_ACTION% the stock operation %OPERATION_TYPE% %OPERATION_REF%.

%OPERATION_BASIC_INFO%

Access the medical records system to view more details about the transaction.

This email was sent from the automated system that cannot accept incoming email. Do not reply to this message.

%CENTER_NAME%

changeSet.author: dev
